ncsa.hdf.view
Interface ImageObserver

All Superinterfaces:
DataObserver
All Known Implementing Classes:
ImageView
public interface ImageObserver
extends DataObserver

An interface for receiving notifications about Image information as the Image is constructed and modified.

Version:
1.3.0 1/26/2002
Author:
Peter X. Cao

Method Summary

          Display an image contour.

          Flip an image horizontally or vertically.

          Returns the image contained in this DataObserver.

          Sets whether or not to display point value of the image.

          Display the color table of this image.
 void showHistogram()
          Draws a histogram of the selected image area.

          Zoom in image up to maximum of 800%.
 void zoomOut()
